list-item.p: • The SOMO10 metric is the annual sum of the positive differences between the daily maximum 8-h average ozone value and the cutoff value set at 10 ppb (20 μg/m 3) calculated for all days in a year. The unit is ppb-day. The 8-h average values are determined as per EU protocols ( European Council Directive 2008/50/EC). The SOMO10 metric is calculated in the same way as SOMO35, but with the lower cutoff value and reflects the epidemiological evidence of associations between short-term ozone exposure and lower ozone levels ( REVIHAAP, 2013).
